title: Wall Street Breakfast August 3: What Moved Markets This Week
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The Dow and S&P 500 posted their fifth straight day of losses to cap the stock market's worst week in months, as investors flocked to safe-haven assets such government bonds, the U.S. dollar and gold. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
